infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photos
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera

plugins.cameraPermission: Permitir a $(PRODUCT_NAME) acceder a tu cámara para tomar fotos de emergencia.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Permitir a $(PRODUCT_NAME) usar tu ubicación para emergencias.

plugins.photosPermission: Permitir a $(PRODUCT_NAME) guardar fotos de emergencia.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Permitir a $(PRODUCT_NAME) guardar fotos de emergencia.
